name: SolbegSoft
description:
Since 2008, SolbegSoft LLC has been successfully implementing software projects of any complexity, consulting world-class companies, developing its own solutions and products. SolbegSoft today is more than 400 professionals, 2 development offices in Minsk, 2 offices in the USA and a support center office in Mumbai.
SolbegSoft service offerings encompass all stages of software development — including business analysis, architecture design and prototyping, development, implementation, testing and QA. SolbegSoft focuses on creating solutions for the Oil and Gas industry, FinTech, Insurance, Security, Logistics and Facility Management.  
In 2018, SolbegSoft became a partner of Helmes, one of the largest IT companies in Europe. As a result, the total employees’ number of the group of companies is more than 800 people. Among the clients of the associated company are ServiceChannel, Audatex, Kuehne and Nagel, Telia, IMAX.
